sensortoolkit.ingest._standard_ingest.parse_setup

parse_setup(setup_path, data_path)[source]

Construct file-specific setup file from the setup.json.

Parameters

  • setup_path (str) – Path to the setup.json file for ingesting datasets into SDFS format.

  • data_path (str) –

    Full path to the directory where recorded datasets are stored.

    • For sensor data, this path should look like: [project_path]/data/sensor_data/[sensor_name]/raw_data

    • For reference data, this path should look like: [project_path]/data/reference_data/[ref_source]/raw/[sitename_siteid]

Returns

Data structure containing file-specific formatting configuration. Passed to standard_ingest() for ingestion of the dataset corresponding to the file into SDFS format.

Return type

file_setup (dict)
